message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $15,000. What do you think?
Hey Alice, Thanks for the offer!  $15,000 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,000.  What do you think?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $13,500. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. $13,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really hoping to close this deal at $12,500.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13,000. What do you think?
Alice,  $13,000 is getting closer, but I'm still hoping to finalize this deal at $12,750. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm ready to move forward if we can agree.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13,200. What do you think?
